title: Forum level?
body: Hello, I'm level 28 now in game and I have logged off before from last level which I believe was level 26 or so but my account on forums says that I'm level 1 and I can't create discussions? How do I fix or change this?

replies.body:
Ahhhhh sometimes you need to make a post in order to get your Boards Level to sync up with your Summoner Level. It seems like this post did the trick, since you're showing up as level 28 for me here ^_^!

P.S. Omg I love that Summoner Name xD

Ohh okay, there we go, thanks!

Also thank you haha, I was thinking something tasty but what happens to me a lot in game? So I was going for muffin or cookie but I think cookie was taken )=
